meanings.definition: To stir (a drink) with a swizzle stick.
meanings.sent1: She likes to swizzle her lemonade with a straw.
meanings.sent2: He always swizzles his coffee before drinking it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to swizzle the milk in its bowl with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The wind swizzled the leaves around in the yard.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly swizzled the sauce in the pan to mix the flavors.

meanings.sent1: The bartender placed a swizzle in each cocktail glass.
meanings.sent2: She collected different types of swizzles from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the swizzle sticks were magic wands.
meanings.sent4: The swizzle in her drink was shaped like a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent5: He used the swizzle to stir his iced tea gently.
